article.title: Lockheed to Support Pakistan Navy's P-3C Orion Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Eagan, Minnesota, is being awarded a $7 million contract modification to support the Pakistan Navy's P-3C upgrade efforts under the Foreign Military Sales program. Support to be provided includes labor, aircraft hangar costs, and acoustic receiver technical refresh program report resolution required to upgrade and overhaul seven P-3C aircraft. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
